text: Dion Joseph Rankine (born 15 October 2002) is an English professional footballer, he currently plays for Wigan Athletic, a club competing in EFL League One. He is a winger. == Club career == In 2023, he joined Chelsea. In 2023, he joined Exeter City on loan. In 14 June 2024, He joined Wigan Athletic from Chelsea, signing a three-year contract. In October 2024, he scored a goal in 20 minutes of match, when match ended, he tied Blackpool as 2-2. == References == Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers
title: Dion Rankine
